card.name: Chaotic Backlash
card.property: Chaotic Backlash deals damage to target player equal to twice the number of white and/or blue permanents he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The concept of thoughtweft fascinates the Nighthearth cult. Imagine, bringing agony to an entire people by torturing just one.

card.name: Bloom Tender
card.property: {T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beauty is a seed, waiting to blossom under her capable hands.

card.name: Drain the Well
card.property: Destroy target land. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trows have learned that it's not wise to eat cinders without a bucket or two of water nearby.

card.name: Sapling of Colfenor
card.property: Indestructible Whenever Sapling of Colfenor attacks, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you gain life equal to that card's toughness, lose life equal to its power, then put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her plans may yet bear fruit.

card.name: Worm Harvest
card.property: Create a 1/1 black and green Worm creature token for each land card in your graveyard. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Monstrify
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gackt came to regret keeping his pet toads on his head.

card.name: Wilderness Hypnotist
card.property: {T}: Target red or green creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I felt as if I were moving in brackish water, as if I were drowning, even though I knew I stood on dry land."—Dindun of Kulrath Mine

card.name: Stigma Lasher
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Whenever Stigma Lasher deals damage to a player, that player can't gain life for the rest of the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Extinguisher's curse lasted long after her departure.

card.name: Soul Snuffers
card.property: When Soul Snuffers enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They once sought to unite with the flame of transcendence. Now they seek only to extinguish the lights of others.

card.name: Slippery Bogle
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bogles are very tasty if you can get the skin off. It's getting a blade on them that's the problem.

card.name: Spirit of the Hearth
card.property: Flying You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thieves know that a snarl in the night means, "Rob another house."

card.name: Noxious Hatchling
card.property: Noxious Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Whenever you cast a black spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Noxious Hatchling. Whenever you cast a green spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Noxious Hatchling.

card.name: Smoldering Butcher
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A cinder's axe bears no marks from parrying a foe's blade.

card.name: Beckon Apparition
card.property: Exile target card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a graveyard is full, the gwyllions rattle the tombs and unleash the spirits into the sky.

card.name: Fetid Heath
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {W/B}, {T}: Add {W}{W}, {W}{B}, or {B}{B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not linger in such places, child. There the gwyllions dance. If they find you, you will join in their revels for eternity."—Talara, elvish safewright

card.name: Voracious Hatchling
card.property: Lifelink Voracious Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. Whenever you cast a white spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Voracious Hatchling. Whenever you cast a black spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Voracious Hatchling.

card.name: Battlegate Mimic
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell that's both red and white, Battlegate Mimic has base power and toughness 4/2 until end of turn and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mimics don't need perfect disguises. They need only the perfect victims: the naive, the young, or the poor of sight.

card.name: Aerie Ouphes
card.property: Sacrifice Aerie Ouphes: Aerie Ouphes deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Flame Jab
card.property: Flame Jab deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Stream Hopper
card.property: {U/R}: Stream Hopper gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like many who dwell in Shadowmoor now, he was robbed of his better half by the Aurora.

card.name: Nightsky Mimic
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell that's both white and black, Nightsky Mimic has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mimic need only touch a being to learn its shape, but touching usually leads to mauling and messily eating.

card.name: Nettle Sentinel
card.property: Nettle Sentinel doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you cast a green spell, you may untap Nettle Sentinel.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though Shadowmoor's monster-haunted wilds beckon, she never leaves her post.

card.name: Rekindled Flame
card.property: Rekindled Flame deals 4 damage to target creature or player. At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent has no cards in hand, you may return Rekindled Flame from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Noggle Bridgebreaker
card.property: When Noggle Bridgebreaker enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's always funny till someone gets hurt. Then it's hilarious."

card.name: Recumbent Bliss
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kithkin somnomancers enjoy the peaceful dreams wafting from their victims.

card.name: Needle Specter
card.property: Flying Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Whenever Needle Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards that many cards.

card.name: Thunderblust
card.property: Haste Thunderblust has trample as long as it has a -1/-1 counter on it. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Sturdy Hatchling
card.property: Sturdy Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. {G/U}: Sturdy Hatchling gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Whenever you cast a green spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Sturdy Hatchling. Whenever you cast a blue spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Sturdy Hatchling.

card.name: Batwing Brume
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn if {W} was spent to cast Batwing Brume. Each player loses 1 life for each attacking creature he or she controls if {B} was spent to cast Batwing Brume. (Do both if {W}{B} was spent.)

card.name: Heartlash Cinder
card.property: Haste Chroma — When Heartlash Cinder enters the battlefield, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of red mana symbols in the mana costs of permanents you control.

card.name: Flickerwisp
card.property: Flying When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings disturb more than air.

card.name: Dream Thief
card.property: Flying When Dream Thief enters the battlefield, draw a card if you've cast another blue spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Awylla's salvaged dreams would finally be put to good use.

card.name: Gwyllion Hedge-Mage
card.property: When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token. When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Swamps, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Grazing Kelpie
card.property: {G/U}, Sacrifice Grazing Kelpie: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Cenn's Enlistment
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Cascade Bluffs
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {U/R}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{R}, or {R}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Travelers bathe in the falls to wash away curses from the pucas who lurk nearby.

card.name: Balefire Liege
card.property: Other red creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a red spell, Balefire Liege deals 3 damage to target player. Whenever you cast a white spell, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Idle Thoughts
card.property: {2}: Draw a card if you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Rise of the Hobgoblins
card.property: When Rise of the Hobgoblins enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens. {R/W}: Red creatures and white creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A river even the merrow dare not cross.

card.name: Groundling Pouncer
card.property: {G/U}: Groundling Pouncer gets +1/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn and only if an opponent controls a creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Endry was determined to teach his groundlings a few winged-faerie tricks.

card.name: Duergar Hedge-Mage
card.property: When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Mountains, you may destroy target artifact. When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Razorfin Abolisher
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: Return target creature with a counter on it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once you have been marked by the merrow, you are not long for their waters.

card.name: Pyrrhic Revival
card.property: Each player returns each creature card from his or her graveyard to the battlefield with an additional -1/-1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They found themselves alive again, still bearing their mortal wounds.

card.name: Gilder Bairn
card.property: {2} {G/U}, {Q}: Double the number of each kind of counter on target permanent. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Do the glowing trinkets show it the way home, or do they set a twisted path for someone else to follow?

card.name: Rugged Prairie
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {R/W}, {T}: Add {R}{R}, {R}{W}, or {W}{W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hobs bury their kin far from home. They believe the dry, open ground keeps hags from stealing the bones and gwyllions from stealing the spirits.

card.name: Cauldron Haze
card.property: Choose any number of target creatures. Each of those creatures gains persist until end of turn. (When it dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Woodlurker Mimic
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell that's both black and green, Woodlurker Mimic has base power and toughness 4/5 until end of turn and gains wither until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mimic's disguise fools its victims just long enough to draw them within range of its venomous tentacles.

card.name: Unwilling Recruit
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +X/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Frorn didn't want to be kept, but he didn't want to be thrown back either.

card.name: Soot Imp
card.property: Flying Whenever a player casts a nonblack spell, that player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If one gets in your chimney, you're going to need a long wick and a barrel of bangstuff to get it out."—Hob Heddil

card.name: Invert the Skies
card.property: Creatures your opponents control lose flying until end of turn if {G} was spent to cast Invert the Skies, and creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if {U} was spent to cast it. (Do both if {G}{U} was spent.)

card.name: Trapjaw Kelpie
card.property: Flash Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Travelers in these waters leave a bit of themselves behind.

card.name: Fable of Wolf and Owl
card.property: Whenever you cast a green spell, you may create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Whenever you cast a blue spell, you may create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forest grew fangs. The sky spread its wings.

card.name: Bloodied Ghost
card.property: Flying Bloodied Ghost enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a knife left for a fortnight in the hollow of a ghastbark tree can inflict a wound so grave."—Kithkin superstition

card.name: Restless Apparition
Unmake
card.property: Exile target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A gwyllion's favorite trap is the vanity mirror. A bewitched piece of glass traps the looker's soul and does away with the body.

card.name: Crag Puca
card.property: {U/R}: Switch Crag Puca's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be happy when you see a puca shaped like mischief. It's far better than one shaped like death."—Dindun of Kulrath Mine

card.name: Loyal Gyrfalcon
card.property: Defender, flying Whenever you cast a white spell, Loyal Gyrfalcon loses defender until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's tethered not to keep it from fleeing but to keep it from eating everything in sight.

card.name: Tilling Treefolk
card.property: When Tilling Treefolk enters the battlefield, you may return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He digs his roots into barren ground, searching for old seeds that never had the chance to sprout.

card.name: Mindwrack Liege
card.property: Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. Other red creatures you control get +1/+1. {U/R}{U/R}{U/R}{U/R}: You may put a blue or red creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Nobilis of War
card.property: Flying Attacking creatures you control get +2/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A great siege is a banquet to him; a long and terrible battle, the most exquisite delicacy."—The Seer's Parables

card.name: Selkie Hedge-Mage
card.property: When Selkie Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Forests, you may gain 3 life. When Selkie Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Islands, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Gift of the Deity
card.property: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.) As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and all creatures able to block it do so.

card.name: Duergar Assailant
card.property: Sacrifice Duergar Assailant: Duergar Assailant deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some duergars dismiss the world above as a fable. They react violently when their comfortable illusions are dispelled.

card.name: Necroskitter
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, you may return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Belligerent Hatchling
card.property: First strike Belligerent Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. Whenever you cast a red spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Belligerent Hatchling. Whenever you cast a white spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Belligerent Hatchling.

card.name: Spitting Image
card.property: Create a token that's a copy of target creature. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spitting is the customary greeting between a creature and its magical impostor.

card.name: Helix Pinnacle
card.property: Shroud (This enchantment can't be the target of spells or abilities.) {X}: Put X tower counters on Helix Pinnacle. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are 100 or more tower counters on Helix Pinnacle, you win the game.

card.name: Outrage Shaman
card.property: Chroma — When Outrage Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature equal to the number of red mana symbols in the mana costs of permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A boggart's mind is a tinderbox of volatile thoughts, hungry for a spark.

card.name: Soul Reap
card.property: Destroy target nongreen creature. Its controller loses 3 life if you've cast another black spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their thoughtweft carried Darial's last thoughts back to his doun. They sorely wished it had not.

card.name: Impelled Giant
card.property: Trample Tap an untapped red creature you control other than Impelled Giant: Impelled Giant gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the power of the creature tapped this way.

card.name: Noggle Bandit
card.property: Noggle Bandit can't be blocked except by creatures with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Noggles believe that they were the first race ever to walk Shadowmoor. They don't "steal." They just take back what's rightfully theirs.

card.name: Crumbling Ashes
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy target creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was there to watch my brothers' quenching. I drew the slightest warmth from their dying rage."—Illulia of Nighthearth

card.name: Murkfiend Liege
card.property: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. Untap all green and/or blue creatures you control during each other player's untap step.

card.name: Ashling, the Extinguisher
card.property: Whenever Ashling, the Extinguisher deals combat damage to a player, choose target creature that player controls. He or she sacrifices that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Aurora had transformed her into a relentless force of destruction.

card.name: Rendclaw Trow
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Stalker Hag
card.property: Swampwalk, forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp or a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her hunt is silent until a bone snaps or flesh tears. Her victims never know to scream.

card.name: Oona's Grace
card.property: Target player draws a card. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oona grants her favored subjects a dream from her own guarded heart.

card.name: Antler Skulkin
card.property: {2}: Target white creature gains persist until end of turn. (When it dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every skull has a tale to tell, and a skulkin is many dire tales cobbled together.

card.name: Fire at Will
card.property: Fire at Will deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target attacking or blocking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Make these shots count. The more foes we drop now, the fewer we'll have trying to kill us later."

card.name: Quillspike
card.property: {B/G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from a creature you control: Quillspike gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While it's true that a quillspike does heal the sick, it's just because it finds them tastier that way.

card.name: Deathbringer Liege
card.property: Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. Other black creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a white spell, you may tap target creature. Whenever you cast a black spell, you may destroy target creature if it's tapped.

card.name: Evershrike
card.property: Flying Evershrike gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it. {X}{W/B}{W/B}: Return Evershrike from your graveyard to the battlefield. You may put an Aura card with converted mana cost X or less from your hand onto the battlefield attached to it. If you don't, exile Evershrike.

card.name: Creakwood Liege
card.property: Other black creatures you control get +1/+1. Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 1/1 black and green Worm creature token.

card.name: Ballynock Trapper
card.property: {T}: Tap target creature. Whenever you cast a white spell, you may untap Ballynock Trapper.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter how large or small, fierce or fleeting, the kithkin have a trap for it.

card.name: Deity of Scars
card.property: Trample Deity of Scars enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it. {B/G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Deity of Scars: Regenerate Deity of Scars.

card.name: Scarecrone
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a Scarecrow: Draw a card. {4}, {T}: Return target artifact creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her poppets bring joy to the truly depraved.

card.name: Inside Out
card.property: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seyden's temperament didn't take well to the puca's magic. Nor did his face.

card.name: Cinder Pyromancer
card.property: {T}: Cinder Pyromancer deals 1 damage to target player. Whenever you cast a red spell, you may untap Cinder Pyromancer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the whole world burns, I'll never grow cold."

card.name: Dream Fracture
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller draws a card. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Creation is a paradox. It hatches from its opposite."—Olka, Mistmeadow witch

card.name: Springjack Pasture
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {4}, {T}: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token. {T}, Sacrifice X Goats: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool. You gain X life.

card.name: Scourge of the Nobilis
card.property: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has "{R/W}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn." As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Twilight Mire
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {B/G}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{G}, or {G}{G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As their roots soaked in a weak tea of bogwater and decay, the trees absorbed the essence of death into their living tissue.

card.name: Raven's Crime
card.property: Target player discards a card. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It plucks away memories like choice bits of carrion.

card.name: Springjack Shepherd
card.property: Chroma — When Springjack Shepherd enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 white Goat creature token for each white mana symbol in the mana costs of permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Better for a doun to lose its cenn than its springjacks."

card.name: Umbra Stalker
card.property: Chroma — Umbra Stalker's power and toughness are each equal to the number of black mana symbols in the mana costs of cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't venture into the darkness, lest it decide not to let you leave.

card.name: Nightmare Incursion
card.property: Search target player's library for up to X cards, where X is the number of Swamps you control, and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Archon of Justice
card.property: Flying When Archon of Justice dies, exile target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In dark times, Truth bears a blade.

card.name: Merrow Bonegnawer
card.property: {T}: Target player exiles a card from his or her graveyard. Whenever you cast a black spell, you may untap Merrow Bonegnawer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Banished to the Dark Meanders for hideous crimes, some merrows find a taste for the darkness . . . and the dead.

card.name: Hobgoblin Dragoon
card.property: Flying, first strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The faeries snickered at first. A common hob in Oona's skies? But his lance ended their mockery, and now the sound of a cicada's wings brings a shudder to the faerie heart.

card.name: Endless Horizons
card.property: When Endless Horizons enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Plains cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a card you own exiled with Endless Horizons into your hand.

card.name: Indigo Faerie
card.property: Flying {U}: Target permanent becomes blue in addition to its other colors until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You should see your face right now."

card.name: Light from Within
card.property: Chroma — Each creature you control gets +1/+1 for each white mana symbol in its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Muscle does not make one strong. It only masks the soul's light. True strength lies in purity of purpose."—Donal Alloway, cenn of Kinscaer

card.name: Regal Force
card.property: When Regal Force enters the battlefield, draw a card for each green creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It rarely moves, standing stock still in its clearing. When it does stir, ravens stop their cawing and crickets their chirping. All of nature watches in awed silence.

card.name: Duergar Mine-Captain
card.property: {1} {R/W}, {Q}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Duergars are prodigious workers with long memories. Some still fulfill intricately detailed orders given decades, if not centuries, before.

card.name: Merrow Levitator
card.property: {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Whenever you cast a blue spell, you may untap Merrow Levitator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He fancies himself a master thief, claiming to "steal the ground" from his victims.

card.name: Jawbone Skulkin
card.property: {2}: Target red creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ah, skull of shrew—a very potent substance. In powdered form, it gives thrice the zing of noggle hoof pulp."—Boghald, Barrenton medic

card.name: Wake Thrasher
card.property: Whenever a permanent you control becomes untapped, Wake Thrasher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anyone who thinks merrows have more brains than brawn has never been run over by one.

card.name: Hotheaded Giant
card.property: Haste Hotheaded Giant enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it unless you've cast another red spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As he races the moon each night, he draws a glowing equator across the world.

card.name: Creakwood Ghoul
card.property: {B/G} {B/G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some eat the living. Some eat the dead. It eats the past.

card.name: Shorecrasher Mimic
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell that's both green and blue, Shorecrasher Mimic has base power and toughness 5/3 until end of turn and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Aurora replaced the changelings' innocence with malice and their curiosity with hunger.

card.name: Twinblade Slasher
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) {1}{G}: Twinblade Slasher gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Righteous anger hones a humble soul.

card.name: Doomgape
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It eats and eats until the juiciest morsel it can find is itself.

card.name: Banishing Knack
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Suddenly he realized that everything was connected by invisible strings, strings that could be pulled—or cut.

card.name: Syphon Life
card.property: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Harvest Gwyllion
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She speaks only in vile epithets, spitting out curses and obscenities that harm others just by the hearing.

card.name: Favor of the Overbeing
card.property: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and has vigilance. As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enlightenment is the mundane seen from the vantage point of the divine.

card.name: Nucklavee
card.property: When Nucklavee enters the battlefield, you may return target red sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. When Nucklavee enters the battlefield, you may return target blue instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It loathes all tastes but two: spells and flesh.

card.name: Puncture Blast
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Puncture Blast deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gnarltrunk didn't remember having quite that many knotholes.

card.name: Canker Abomination
card.property: As Canker Abomination enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Canker Abomination enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it for each creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once the hideous disease takes hold, it spreads through both bark and mind.

card.name: Snakeform
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Snake with base power and toughness 1/1. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Losing his possessions distressed him, but the lack of limbs was strangely liberating.

card.name: Crackleburr
Waves of Aggression
card.property: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Hallowed Burial
card.property: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd rather hear the screams of battle than the quiet that follows."—Talara, elvish safewright

card.name: Glamerdye
card.property: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Talonrend
card.property: Flying {U/R}: Talonrend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Change is a denizen of Shadowmoor as much as ouphes and noggles are.

card.name: Cankerous Thirst
card.property: If {B} was spent to cast Cankerous Thirst, you may have target creature get -3/-3 until end of turn. If {G} was spent to cast Cankerous Thirst, you may have target creature get +3/+3 until end of turn. (Do both if {B}{G} was spent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing warms the bark on a chilly day like a draught of elf.

card.name: Stillmoon Cavalier
card.property: Protection from white and from black {W/B}: Stillmoon Cavalier gains flying until end of turn. {W/B}: Stillmoon Cavalier gains first strike until end of turn. {W/B}{W/B}: Stillmoon Cavalier gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Hearthfire Hobgoblin
card.property: Double strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hobgoblins are best left alone. They sharpen their farm implements far more than is necessary for their work in the fields.

card.name: Figure of Destiny
card.property: {R/W}: Figure of Destiny becomes a Kithkin Spirit with base power and toughness 2/2. {R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 4/4. {R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with base power and toughness 8/8, flying, and first strike.

card.name: Talara's Battalion
card.property: Trample Cast Talara's Battalion only if you've cast another green spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The safewright Talara protects a delicate woodland waterfall. She has vowed to send wave after wave of warriors to slay any who would dare disturb its beauty.

card.name: Noggle Ransacker
card.property: When Noggle Ransacker enters the battlefield, each player draws two cards, then discards a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Noggles live purely by what they can scavenge. There is not a single thing a noggle eats, wears, or uses that did not once belong to another.

card.name: Kithkin Zealot
card.property: When Kithkin Zealot enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each black and/or red permanent target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more his flock fears, the more power he wields.

card.name: Hateflayer
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) {2}{R}, {Q}: Hateflayer deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

card.name: Suture Spirit
card.property: Flying {W/B}{W/B}{W/B}: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Is her need to heal born out of compassion or penance?

card.name: Marshdrinker Giant
card.property: When Marshdrinker Giant enters the battlefield, destroy target Island or Swamp an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When giants rise from their long slumbers, they rarely remember how fragile the waking world can be.

card.name: Hag Hedge-Mage
card.property: When Hag Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Swamps, you may have target player discard a card. When Hag Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Forests, you may put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Double Cleave
card.property: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

card.name: Cache Raiders
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What the current doesn't take, they do.

card.name: Primalcrux
card.property: Trample Chroma — Primalcrux's power and toughness are each equal to the number of green mana symbols in the mana costs of permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When nature is backed into a corner, just like its children, it lashes out.

card.name: Odious Trow
card.property: {1} {B/G}: Regenerate Odious Trow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trows are the vile trolls that lurk in the bogs of Shadowmoor. They reappear each night to frighten the living and gnaw the dead.

card.name: Edge of the Divinity
card.property: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+2. As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +2/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The divinity's patronage confers both wicked grace and graceful wickedness.

card.name: Wistful Selkie
card.property: When Wistful Selkie enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Selkies call to a sea they never swam, in a tongue they never spoke, with a song they never learned.

card.name: Sanity Grinding
card.property: Chroma — Reveal the top ten cards of your library. For each blue mana symbol in the mana costs of the revealed cards, target opponent puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Then put the cards you revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Altar Golem
card.property: Trample Altar Golem's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield. Altar Golem doesn't untap during your untap step. Tap five untapped creatures you control: Untap Altar Golem.

card.name: Kithkin Spellduster
card.property: Flying {1}{W}, Sacrifice Kithkin Spellduster: Destroy target enchantment. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Savage Conception
card.property: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some beasts are born not of a mother, but of magic.

card.name: Leering Emblem
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The banner was not a symbol of victory, but a herald of the carnage to come.

card.name: Endure
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and permanents you control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Aurora had lessened the kithkins' kindness, deepened their paranoia, and dulled their sense of pain.

card.name: Desecrator Hag
card.property: When Desecrator Hag enters the battlefield, return to your hand the creature card in your graveyard with the greatest power. If two or more cards are tied for greatest power, you choose one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Loose earth is not a burial but an appetizer.

card.name: Ward of Bones
card.property: Each opponent who controls more creatures than you can't cast creature spells. The same is true for artifacts and enchantments. Each opponent who controls more lands than you can't play lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mages dare not attempt magic in its grotesque presence.

card.name: Glen Elendra Archmage
card.property: Flying {U}, Sacrifice Glen Elendra Archmage: Counter target noncreature spell. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Shrewd Hatchling
card.property: Shrewd Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. {U/R}: Target creature can't block Shrewd Hatchling this turn. Whenever you cast a blue spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling. Whenever you cast a red spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling.

card.name: Unnerving Assault
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0 until end of turn if {U} was spent to cast Unnerving Assault, and creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast it. (Do both if {U}{R} was spent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scales of battle rarely balance.

card.name: Duergar Cave-Guard
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) {R/W}: Duergar Cave-Guard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Duergars who grow too large to live in the tunnels are sent topside to defend the entrances from intruders.

card.name: Riverfall Mimic
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell that's both blue and red, Riverfall Mimic has base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mimics don't hide their natural form well, but their disguises work well enough on boggarts.

card.name: Swirling Spriggan
card.property: {G/U} {G/U}: Target creature you control becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After its encounter with the spriggan, the patrol was red with anger, green with envy, white with fear, and painfully black and blue.

card.name: Patrol Signaler
card.property: {1} {W}, {Q}: Create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many a keen-eared bogle has run afoul of a clever and silently orchestrated kithkin ambush.

card.name: Spitemare
card.property: Whenever Spitemare is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I knew a creature carved from a dream of wild freedom. Any attempt to leash or exploit it failed, and at terrible cost."—Ashling

card.name: Hoof Skulkin
card.property: {3}: Target green creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It hunts with the memory of a long lost herd.

card.name: Phosphorescent Feast
card.property: Chroma — Reveal any number of cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each green mana symbol in those cards' mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The boggarts gorged themselves until their bellies glowed.

card.name: Overbeing of Myth
card.property: Overbeing of Myth's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She walks among us unseen, learning from our imperfections."—The Seer's Parables

card.name: Nip Gwyllion
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once your life and all your worldly possessions have been surrendered to her, a gwyllion can be surprisingly civilized.

card.name: Hatchet Bully
card.property: {2} {R}, {T}, Put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control: Hatchet Bully deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not much for eating, but I think we can find somethin' to do with it."

card.name: Wickerbough Elder
card.property: Wickerbough Elder enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it. {G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Wickerbough Elder: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Living scarecrows make a mockery of the natural order. Dead ones make fine hats."

card.name: Clout of the Dominus
card.property: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) As long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has haste.

card.name: Cold-Eyed Selkie
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Cold-Eyed Selkie deals combat damage to a player, you may draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She follows the old tributaries built when merrows still shaped the tides.

card.name: Call the Skybreaker
card.property: Create a 5/5 blue and red Elemental creature token with flying. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It hears and answers every orison across Shadowmoor.

card.name: Flooded Grove
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {G/U}, {T}: Add {G}{G}, {G}{U}, or {U}{U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At full moon, the river seeps over its banks and crawls through the woods like a blanket of serpents.

card.name: Lingering Tormentor
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bogeyman doesn't disappear when you close your eyes.

card.name: Fiery Bombardment
card.property: Chroma — {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Fiery Bombardment deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of red mana symbols in the sacrificed creature's mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It kills two beasts with one thrown.

card.name: Dominus of Fealty
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain control of target permanent until end of turn. If you do, untap it and it gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing is truly your own. It is his, whether you know it or not."—The Seer's Parables

card.name: Shell Skulkin
card.property: {3}: Target blue creature gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Skulkins confer strange benefits on unsuspecting patrons.

card.name: Fang Skulkin
card.property: {2}: Target black creature gains wither until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything falls apart. But living things fall apart in the most fascinating ways."—Mowagh the Gwyllion

card.name: Noggle Hedge-Mage
card.property: When Noggle Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Islands, you may tap two target permanents. When Noggle Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Mountains, you may have Noggle Hedge-Mage deal 2 damage to target player.

card.name: Inundate
card.property: Return all nonblue creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For years, the landfolk have emptied their refuse into the waters. It's time to return the favor."

card.name: Duskdale Wurm
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Last time, it tore up the Wilt-Leaf, turned Mistmeadow into a mudhole, and made the river jump its banks. On the bright side, we were eating venison for weeks."—Donal Alloway, cenn of Kinscaer

card.name: Moonhold
card.property: Target player can't play lands this turn if {R} was spent to cast Moonhold and can't cast creature spells this turn if {W} was spent to cast it. (Do both if {R}{W} was spent.)

card.name: Mirror Sheen

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even treefolk witches steer clear of the unpredictable woods near Glen Elendra. Spells refract off the glamer-polished trees and the eyes of lurking pucas.

card.name: Divinity of Pride
card.property: Flying, lifelink Divinity of Pride gets +4/+4 as long as you have 25 or more life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She spoke of mystery and portent, of such unfathomable things that my mind screamed for pity."—The Seer's Parables

card.name: Talara's Bane
card.property: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a green or white creature card from it. You gain life equal to that creature card's toughness, then that player discards that card.
